About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. General reference assistance available; limited copying service available for paper based items, subject to conservation assessment.

About.Access: By appointment - phone, email or in writing. Proof of identity required. Items may only be viewed in the archives under supervision of the Archivist. Closed periods apply for some records - apply to the Archivist for details. Access to restricted material may be gained by authorisation from the Principal or the Archivist.

About.Acquisition focus: Material related to the school's administration, publications, photographs and textiles. Records relating to old scholars and extra curricular activities.

About.Major holdings:
Council of Governors: Minutes 1847-1995 (1.5m).
	Headmasters reports 1877- (1m).
	Annual magazines 1922-29, 1952-(0.5m).
	School newsletters 1963- (0.5m)
	Old Scholar's Association: Papers, minutes, photos 1911- (1.2m).Photographs 1880- (5m).

About.References: Ray, W R, Pulteney Grammar School, 1847-1997, A Record, revised and brought up to date by K Brunton, F H Greet and J R Moore.
